metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9556 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the qtmd_decompress function in libmspack 0.4 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang) via a crafted CABfile, which triggers an infinite loop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9556` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cabextract - 1.6-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

libmspack0 - 0.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cabextract package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6-1').
libmspack package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4-3').
